G2：前移動入力しながら攻撃すると2段目が高威力魔法弾攻撃に派生: G2: Attacking while pressing the forward movement key alters the second stage to fire a high damage magic bullet.
G3：後移動入力しながら攻撃すると3段目の魔法弾射出時、自身にEP継続回復・小を: G3: Attacking while pressing the backward movement key grants yourself Continuous EP Recovery (S) during the third stage.

G1：自身にEP継続回復・中を付与する: G1: Grant yourself Continuous EP Recovery (M).

Deal additional damage to enemies whose elemental status ailment is level 1, level 2, or is elemental bursted. Prioritizes the locked-on target when initially summoned. Consumes 20 EP.
G1：自身の周囲にクリスタルを2つ生成する。生成した状態で他の攻撃タクティカルス: G1: Summon two crystals that float beside you and fire non-elemental magic bullets when you use attack Tactical Skills, prioritizing locked-on targets. The equipped weapon's element will apply to this skill.
G1：自身の中心から氷を炸裂させる氷属性攻撃を行い、ヒットしたエネミーに怯みを与: G1: Unleash a barrage of ice shards from yourself in an Ice elemental attack, staggering hit enemies. Consumes 25 EP.
G3：攻撃ヒット時、移動速度ダウン・中付与: G3: Apply Reduced Movement Speed (M) on hit.

G1：ボタン入力で火属性の火炎放射攻撃を行う。再度ボタン入力で停止する。攻撃中は: G1: Initiate a constant stream of flames that deal Fire elemental damage, continuously consuming EP. Press the skill button again to end the attack. Moving is possible while attacking, but will increase EP consumption.

G2：前移動入力しながら攻撃すると3段目が光属性突き攻撃に派生: G2: Attack while pressing the forward movement key to alter the third stage into a Light elemental thrust attack.
G3：後移動入力しながら攻撃すると2段目が盾殴打攻撃に派生。攻撃ヒット時、一定時: G3: Attack while pressing backward movement key to alter the second stage to strike with your shield, granting yourself Shield Save (S) on successful hits.
G1：盾を構えて攻撃をガードすることができる。ガード成功時シールドゲージ消費。シ: G1: Prepare your shield to guard against attacks. Successful blocks will consume Shield Gauge. G2：シールドゲージの回復速度上昇: G2: Increase Shield Gauge recovery speed.
G1：自身を中心にプレイヤーに被ダメージダウン・中を付与するエリアを生成する。効: G1: Place an area centered on yourself that provides Reduced Damage Taken (M) while inside its range.
G1：長押し中、巨大盾を展開。展開中はシールドゲージの減少無効。展開中は移動不可: G1: Hold the skill button to summon a gigantic shield. While deployed, Shield Gauge is not consumed and movement is disabled. Automatically disappears after some time.

G3：ダッシュ攻撃中移動速度上昇: G3: Increase movement speed while running.
発動時、自身に複数の効果を付与し、HPを大回復する。シールドブレイク時、シールド: Recover a large amount of HP and gain various effects. If you are shield broken, your Shield Gauge is fully restored. The Ult Gauge will be filled by successful attacks and blocks. Activating the skill with a full Ult Gauge will consume the gauge and grant your allies various buffs. Level 1: Reduced Damage Taken (M) and HP Regeneration (S). Level 2: Increased Damage Dealt (S). Level 3: Status Ailment Immunity.
G1：自身を中心に衝撃波攻撃を行う。ヒットしたエネミーに挑発を付与し、引き寄せる: G1: Slam your sword into the ground, pulling in nearby enemies and Provoking them. Greatly increases your aggro.

G1：盾を構えて突進攻撃を行う。ヒットしたエネミーにスタンを付与。突進中はガード: G1: Raise your shield and perform a dash attack. Enemies that are hit will be Stunned. While dashing, your shield will guard against attacks, consuming Shield Gauge.

G1：一定時間、ガード成功時のシールドゲージ消費量が大きく減少。カウンタースラッ: G1: Greatly reduce Shield Gauge consumption from guarding, reduce damage taken during Counter Slash, and increase Counter Slash attack range.
